items.label: 539f6accec4f024411ec943d
items.description:
Time of Use

For any customer presently taking service or eligible to take service under the Light Plant's Schedule A and having installed an off-peak Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) system with the following provisions: -energy consumed during the off-peak periods as defined below will be at this off-peak rate
-loads served under this off-peak provision must be directly controlled by and acceptable to the Light Plant
-loads served under this off-peak provision must make a positive contribution towards the Light Plant's system load factor.  This rate schedule is applicable to all electric service required by the customer exclusively for domestic purposes for individual (single-family) private residences and individually-metered apartment units. The electrical connection of any equipment and/or appliance(s) installed so as to use off-peak energy under this rate must be inspected and approved by the Light Plant. The electrical supply to the off-peak equipment and/or appliance(s) must be controlled by the Light Plant.

The Light Plant's Hydropower Adjustment Clause, M.D.T.E. #136, will apply to all KWH sold under this schedule.
items.name: Schedule A-2: Residential Time-of-Use
